meanings.definition: The practice of communicating news by photographs.
meanings.sent1: I learned about photojournalisms in my photography class.
meanings.sent2: She studied photojournalisms to become a better photographer.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to do photojournalisms by taking pictures of birds outside.
meanings.sent4: His camera was his tool for photojournalisms, capturing moments in time.
meanings.sent5: The exhibit showcased the power of photojournalisms in telling stories visually.

meanings.definition: The profession of reporting news through photographs.
meanings.sent1: Photojournalisms require both photography skills and journalistic integrity.
meanings.sent2: Many admire the dedication of those in the field of photojournalisms.
meanings.sent3: The detective decided to solve the case using only photojournalisms.
meanings.sent4: Her photojournalisms were like windows into different worlds.
meanings.sent5: The award-winning photojournalisms captured the essence of the event perfectly.
